name: Jordan Celton
title: Web Developer
aboutText: After several years in another field, I decided to transition to web development, specifically as a web integrator. This choice was motivated by my passion for creating websites and my desire to combine creativity and technology. Today, I take real pleasure in building intuitive, modern websites that meet user needs. Each project is an opportunity for me to learn, face new challenges, and improve my skills.
designWebText: Creation of modern and intuitive designs tailored to the needs of users and businesses.
integrationWebText: Integration of responsive websites optimized for all types of screens, using best web practices.
developmentFrontEndText: Development of the user interface, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience for visitors.
optimizationPerformanceText: Improvement of website speed and performance for fast and seamless navigation.

educationList.description: Intensive Web Integrator training, learning front-end and back-end technologies, and completing several concrete projects.

educationList.degree: Technical Baccalaureate in Machining - Lycée Le Likes
educationList.description: Obtained the Technical Baccalaureate with a specialization in machining techniques at Lycée Le Likes, developing skills in programming and industrial manufacturing.

experienceList.description: Developing websites and applications for clients across various sectors, using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
